pkgmetadata.longdescription: Pubmed Unified REtrieval for Multi-Output Exploration // Access a variety of 'PubMed' data through a single, user-friendly interface, including abstracts https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/, bibliometrics from 'iCite' https://icite.od.nih.gov/, pubtations from 'PubTator3' https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/research/pubtator3/, and full-text records from 'PMC' https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/.
